name: E-Commerce Website
description: E-commerce is the activity of electronically buying or selling of products on online services or over the Internet.

name: Blog Website
description: A blog (a truncation of weblog)[1] is a discussion or informational website published on the World Wide Web consisting of discrete, often informal diary-style text entries (posts). Posts are typically displayed in reverse chronological order, so that the most recent post appears first, at the top of the web page.

name: E-Learning Website
description: eLearning, or electronic learning, is the delivery of learning and training through digital resources.

name: A E-Commerce Marketplace
description: An online marketplace is a type of e-commerce website where product or service information is provided by multiple third parties.
